descriptionHtml:
Who else thinks fire should do more damage? Just kidding, it doesn't matter. *Epic guitar music begins* I THOUGHT THAT, AND I FIXED THAT! Install this mod, and WATCH AS YOUR FIRE BURNS FOES THE WAY IT SHOULD! But be careful, your ENEMIES ALSO have stronger FIREPOWER! A term which here means THEY CAN ALSO USE THE STRONGER FIRE SPELL, THE ONE THAT IS THREE TIMES STRONGER THAN THE VANILLA SPELL,Â THE ONE THAT THIS MOD ADDS.

You can find this spell in the- JUST KIDDING, IT ALTERS A VANILLA SPELL. GOOD LUCK FAILING TO FIND THIS ONE!
author: Epsilon725 AKA SilverStarApple
